pages.text: Affects spells involved with placing blocks in the world. Affected spells have 20% reduced cooldown and increased range of effect. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_sojourn)Path of the Sojourn$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepter yearns to improve the world around it. Imbues onto the Builders Scepter and persists through the Path of the Sojourn
